description: The favourite to win Poland's 28 June election denounces gay rights activism as an alien ideology.
title: Polish election: Andrzej Duda says LGBT 'ideology' worse than communism
title_page: Polish election: Andrzej Duda says LGBT 'ideology' worse than communism - BBC News
maintext: In his speech in Brzeg, Mr Duda said "this is not why my parents' generation for 40 years struggled to expel communist ideology from schools, so that it could not be foisted on children, could not brainwash and indoctrinate them...
